pages.title: Alchemical Cauldron
pages.text: The $(item)Alchemical Cauldron$() is a vessel for transmuting materials using Moon Water and mana.$(br2)Fill it with a $(item)Moon Water Bucket$(), add ingredients, and supply mana to begin the alchemical process.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: 1. Place the cauldron$(br)2. Right-click with Moon Water Bucket$(br)3. Add up to 4 ingredients$(br)4. Supply mana via Resonators$(br)5. Wait for the transmutation$(br2)The cauldron will glow when active. Results appear above when complete.

pages.title: Stardust Catalyst
pages.text: A $(item)Stardust Catalyst$() improves transmutation efficiency. Some advanced recipes require it as an ingredient.$(br2)Craft from Stardust and Lunar Dust in the cauldron itself.

pages.title: Basic Recipes
pages.text: $(li)$(item)Enhanced Gold$(): Gold + Stardust$(li)$(item)Radiant Diamond$(): Diamond + 2x Stardust$(li)$(item)Stardust Catalyst$(): 2x Stardust + Lunar Dust$(li)$(item)Celestial Nucleus$(): Star Fragment + Nether Star + Catalyst

pages.title: Celestial Nucleus
pages.text: The $(item)Celestial Nucleus$() is the pinnacle of alchemical achievement. This powerful material can be used in the most advanced crafting recipes.$(br2)Requires a Stardust Catalyst to create.
